metadata.name: Tamper Windows Defender Remove-MpPreference - ScriptBlockLogging
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to remove Windows Defender configuration using the 'MpPreference' cmdlet

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-mppreference')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-controlledfolderaccessprotectedfolders ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-attacksurfacereductionrules_ids ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-attacksurfacereductionrules_actions ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-checkforsignaturesbeforerunningscan '))))

output.summary: Detects attempts to remove Windows Defender configuration using the 'MpPreference' cmdlet

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts Reference: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/core-infrastructure-and-security/windows-10-controlled-folder-access-event-search/ba-p/2326088
